test-case.name: fn-substring-after-1
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = "". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file. Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string("A") $arg2 = "A". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "A" $arg2 = "a". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-18
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-19
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "****" $arg2 = "***".

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-20
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-after" function using numbers as part of the string. Arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "12345" $arg2 = "1234".

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-21
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-after" function using "substring-after" backwards. Arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "substring-after" $arg2 = "retfa-gnirtsbus". Use count to avoid empty file.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after()`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after(())`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after((), (), "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint", "wrong param")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after("a string", "a string", "http://www.example.com/COLLATION/NOT/SUPPORTED")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after("foo", "fo", "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint") eq "o"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after("tattoo", "tat") eq "too"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after("tattoo", "tattoo") eq ""`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after("abcdefgedij", "def") eq "gedij"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after((), ()) eq ""`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after("a string", ()) eq "a string"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after("a string", "not in other") eq ""`.
